messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about purchasing new SIMs.
How can I buy new Telenor Sim?
Where do I go to get a new Telenor SIM card?
What's the process to purchase a Telenor SIM?
You can buy a new SIM from the nearest franchise. Please visit the franchise with your original CNIC. For locations, visit: https://www.telenor.com.pk/franchise-addresses/
